name: magnet
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Electric moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Electric-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A hold item that boosts ELECTRIC- type moves.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that boosts ELECTRIC- type moves.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An item to be held by a POKéMON. A powerful magnet that boosts the power of ELECTRIC-type moves.
